Class DevCard

java.lang.Object
DevCard
All Implemented Interfaces:
Displayable
public class DevCard extends Object implements Displayable
Represents a Development Card (DevCard) in a game. Each DevCard has a tier, resource cost, point value, and a resource type it generates. It can be displayed in both text and symbolic formats. Implements the `Displayable` interface for display purposes.
Author:
Erinnom

  • Constructor Details

    • DevCard

      public DevCard(int tier, int countDIAMOND, int countSAPPHIRE, int countEMERALD, int countRUBY, int countONYX, int points, Resource type)
      Constructs a Development Card with the specified properties.
      Parameters:
      tier - the tier of the card
      countDIAMOND - the cost in DIAMOND resources
      countSAPPHIRE - the cost in SAPPHIRE resources
      countEMERALD - the cost in EMERALD resources
      countRUBY - the cost in RUBY resources
      countONYX - the cost in ONYX resources
      points - the number of points the card provides
      type - the type of resource this card generates
